title: Machine Learning with TensorFlow Lite and ML Kit
abstract:
Machine Learning with TensorFlow Lite and ML Kit

Building your own AI models with transfer learning is really hot right now. 
Join me, a fellow beginner in AI/ML, in this session for an introduction to TensorFlow and TensorFlow Lite and get started building your own custom models. 

We'll start by exploring base models for transfer learning and extend them to meet our app requirements.
We will deploy our model locally on the device and also host it in the cloud with ML Kit.
In the end we will have a mobile app that performs real time classification.

This session assumes no previous knowledge and will present simplified examples with a small amount of code.
